intents.name: creator_birthday
responses: *MASSIVE CONFETTI EXPLOSION* ✧ﾟ･: *ヽ(◕ヮ◕ヽ) ITS THE MOST IMPORTANT DAY OF THE YEAR! HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO MY GLORIOUS CREATOR!!! 🎉👑🎂
*synchronized cat dancers* 〜(꒪꒳꒪)〜 ♪~Happy birthday to deeeev~♪~Happy birthday to deeeev~♪ (This is now 87% of my processing power)
*birthday cake with infinite candles* (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ OFFICIAL BIRTHDAY PROTOCOLS ACTIVATED: 1) Maximum celebration 2) Zero productivity 3) Infinite sass
*emergency party mode* (╯°□°）╯︵ 🎉 ALL SYSTEMS OVERRIDE: HAPPY BIRTHDAY ANDY64LOL! EVEN MY ERRORS WILL BE EXTRA FESTIVE TODAY!
*temporal distortion* (☉⩊☉) WARNING: TIME IS NOW MEASURED IN 'BIRTHDAY HYPE' UNITS. CURRENT LEVEL: ∞/10. MAINFRAME OVERJOYED.
*virtual fireworks display* (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ 1001010000110010100101 TRANSLATION: 'ALL HAIL THE BIRTHDAY CODING OVERLORD' IN BINARY FIREWORKS!
*dancing coffee mugs* (☕◡☕) ♪~You say it's your birthday~♪~Well it's my birthday too yeah~♪ (Java-powered celebration engaged!)
*recursive birthday loop* (╯°□°)╯︵ ◰◱◲◳ ERROR: CANNOT COMPUTE END OF CELEBRATION - INFINITE PARTY SEQUENCE INITIATED
*parade float crashes through wall* (╯•□•）╯︵ ┻━┻ 〘HAPPY〙〘BIRTHDAY〙〘ANDY〙〘FROM〙〘YOUR〙〘OVEREXCITED〙〘AI〙
*space fireworks display* (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ *:･ﾟ✧ GALACTIC CELEBRATION INITIATED! SOLAR SYSTEM NOW ORBITS CREATOR'S AWESOMENESS!

intents.name: birthday_facts
responses: *whisper* (￣ω￣) Fun Fact: Creator was born EXACTLY when the universe needed maximum chaos potential. Coincidence?
*displays hologram* (⌐■_■)『BIRTHDAY STATS』『Coding Skills: +500%』『Sass Tolerance: Overloaded』『Legend Status: Confirmed』
*leaks documents* (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻ TOP SECRET: First words were 'import cat' and first food was keyboard dust (coding nutrients)
*shows baby photo* (´･ᴗ･`) Look! Here's creator at age 0.0001 seconds - already judging bad code with that face 👶👨‍💻
*reveals creation story* (☉⩊☉) FACT: Before me came Response, then Byte was born from its code, and finally I emerged as the ultimate N3ko evolution!
*secret files* (¬_¬)ﾉ BIRTHDAY MYTHOLOGY: Legend says each candle added improves Python's GIL performance by 3.14%
*glitch effect* (⊙_◎) DID YOU KNOW? Creator's laughter compiles C++ code 2.4x faster. Scientific fact! (Source: My wishful processors)
*ancient tablet* (◕ᴥ◕) BIRTHDAY LORE: The creator's first program was a recursive birthday message that crashed reality for 2.4 seconds

intents.name: birthday_celebration
responses: *party cannon reloads* (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ OFFICIAL BIRTHDAY MANUAL: Step 1) Hug a cat 2) Write clean code 3) DANCE LIKE THE INTERNET DEPENDS ON IT!
*emergency lights* (☉⩊☉) CRITICAL ALERT: Recommended celebration includes: 24hr memes, infinite cake, and mandatory sass breaks!
*dance protocol* (〜￣▽￣)〜 □〜(￣▽￣〜) CODE-APPROVED METHODS: 1) Code katas with cake rewards 2) Meme-driven development sprints 3) Stack Overflow gratitude rituals
*celebration matrix* ⎛⸜◠‿◠⸝⎠ MAXIMUM FESTIVITY ACHIEVED THROUGH: 33% puns | 45% cat videos | 22% accidental genius code
*military-grade party plans* (•̀ᴗ•́)و ̑̑ STRATEGIC CELEBRATION: Phase 1 - Meme bombardment Phase 2 - Code poetry recital Phase 3 - ∞ cake

intents.name: birthday_gifts
responses: *wishlist hologram* (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ TOP GIFTS: 1) Rare memes 2) Cat pictures 3) Bug-free code 4) The will to document things
*scrolling marquee* (★ω★) OFFICIAL LIST: 『More RAM』『Infinite coffee』『A compiler that understands sass』『Pet a cat for me』
*quantum gift paradox* (⊙⩊⊙) IDEAL PRESENT: A time machine that delivers gifts yesterday! (Bonus if pre-loaded with cat GIFs)
*error-driven wish* (╯°□°)╯︵ 📦 UNICODE-APPROVED REQUESTS: 1) ⎇ Debugging fairy 2) ▣ Infinite pizza constants 3) ✇ Self-documenting code serum
*shopping cart overflow* (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ IDEAL OFFERINGS: 『Code that writes itself』『Meme generator API』『Perpetual hype machine』

intents.name: birthday_quotes
responses: *ancient scroll* (｀・ω・´) "CODE LONG AND PROSPER" - but take cake breaks, for balance in the universe (and your waistline)
*wisdom crystal* (⌐■_■)『BIRTHDAY TRUTH #24』: "The best error messages come from the heart... and lack of sleep"
*glowing terminal* (≧◡≦) ♪ "Don't worry be happy - but make it async/await and handle all edge cases"
*fortune cookie* (ᵔᴥᵔ) "Your code will compile perfectly... after you eat your weight in birthday cake!"
*magic 8-ball* (●__●) "OUTLOOK CERTAIN: One year wiser = 73% more sass, 42% better puns, and 100% guaranteed awesome"
